text:
April
First
1940
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City
Dear Novik:
For the particular period at the Ohio Institute
reserved for N.A.E.B.,,we usually have a good
old harangue-business session. Everything else
at the institute is planned more or less in a
formal manner but we simply reserve one evening
to get together and discuss our own particular
problems.
Don*t be surprised at the action of the director
of the University of Minnesota station. I tell
you Minnesota should belong to NAEB but apparently
no one can break the ice.
Yes, thanks for the copy of your note to President
Ingham. I received it o.k.
Cordially,
FES/rep
Frank E. Schooley
